name: What if they kissed...?
description:
This game was made for the UCSC alumni 2022 game jam!

Theme: "First Contact"

Tutorial:

Every so often a quick time event will spawn. These appear as leaves with a letter on them. (A, S, D, J, K, L). Hit the corresponding key to keep your hands steady! Hitting the wrong key or taking too long will cause your hands to slip further apart.

Game By:

Joann Wong (Art)

Max Monson (Music)

Jared Nolen (Code)

Juan Alvarado (Code)
